name: Phantom Waltz
description:
A top-down show where you have to steal the spotlight as well as fight ghost. Give your best act and enjoy the show.

Don't believe in ghost ? Then try to get your best score by defeating enemies and stay in the spotlight while dancing around the stage avoiding enemies.

Controls

[WASD] - Move

[Space] - Attack

Credits

Sean Matthew - Game Programmer & Game Designer

Dheanandri - 2D Artist & Game Designer

Christopher Gerardito M.P. - Sound Engineer & 2D Artist & Game Designer

Christopher Vincent W. - Sound Engineer & Game Designer
